active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the forensic implications of relying solely on SIM card recovery for SMS in a SIM swap attack scenario (MITRE ATT&CK T1451). What evidence might be missed, and how does this connect to broader mobile device forensics? Support your points with references to NIST SP 800-86 or 3GPP standards.

active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
